text:
What's the present and future of microservices architectures? I'm listening to this wide-ranging @InfoQ panel discussion—they hit on DDD, REST, service mesh and more—featuring @holly_cummins, @crichardson, @davefarley77, and Glenn Engstrand.

https://t.co/wop31IGSAa

author.description: Director of Developer Relations and Outbound Product Management at @googlecloud, @pluralsight trainer, blogger, author, speaker.
author.name: Richard Seroter
